Users

Object Picker

This brings up the Exchange picker to find users.

Query Builder

This brings up the Query Builder to find users via LDAP queries.

Public Folder

Enter an Exchange Public Folder Account name.

Enter a User

Key in a given user. Use the arrow keys to add or remove users.

Load

You can use an XML or a CSV (comma separated value) file to choose users. This also allows for mapping email addresses between Exchange and Zimbra. The Exchange name and Zimbra name are separated by a comma.

Save

You can save your configuration to a .csv file
